channel.title: Earthscape V3 - Near Completion
channel.description:
[u][b]What Is Earthscape?[/b][/u] Earthscape is a project i started a while ago, while i had just begun coding runescape private servers. It is a balanced source, with great pking, and also a manageable economy. I was aiming for something that looked earth-like, hence the home in Version one, the training in version 1 and 2, and the pk area, which has been maintained through all 3 versions released so far. It has a unique way of runecrafting, which i have totally integrated into the source, it seems as tho it was a part of the runescape we now emulate.
[u][b]What Is So Great About Earthscape?[/b][/u] Earthscape isn't one of those server like deltascape, which will become immensely famous, as i only use it to test certain codes.
[b][u]Look Be low for A guide as to what i have completed, what i have begun, and what is incomplete.[/u][/b]
[font=Verdana]Red - Incomplete Green - Complete Black - Not Changing Orange - Doing Now [/font]
Wyvern Jad Wishing Well New Home Theiving Shops Pk Area Summoning Dags New Runecrafting
New Home - ( i have added a 'players online' scoreboard to it, and am adding the 'wishing well' as well) [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/untitled-4.jpg[/img]
DaganoTH
[IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/dags.jpg[/img]

[IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/runecrafting.jpg[/img]

[IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/shops-1.jpg[/img]

@rash wrote:

What Is Earthscape?
Earthscape is a project i started a while ago, while i had just begun coding runescape private servers.
It is a balanced source, with great pking, and also a manageable economy.
I was aiming for something that looked earth-like, hence the home in Version one, the training in version 1 and 2, and the pk area, which has been maintained through all 3 versions released so far.
It has a unique way of runecrafting, which i have totally integrated into the source, it seems as tho it was a part of the runescape we now emulate.

What Is So Great About Earthscape?
Earthscape isn’t one of those server like deltascape, which will become immensely famous, as i only use it to test certain codes.
